Articles.Content:
Hello,
I'm actually building a space station that will go around laythe, but 3.75 meters parts are a little too small to me for a big space station; I've downloaded mods for the 5m parts that contains supplies, monopropellant, LfO for a ssto, but I can't found a mod adding 5m Habitation modules (I've got porkjet's mod but I'm searching for an inline one, not bubble-like). of course cool IVAs are welcome :)
Any idea?
tweak scale - [url]http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/112693[/url] Edited November 21, 2015 by EladDv

TweakScale can increase/decrease the size but it will not change the space inside. A Hitchhiker pod scaled to 5m still seats just 4 Kerbals.

[URL="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/75074-1-0-Taurus-HCV-3-75-m-CSM-System-v1-5-3-July-1-2014"][B]Taurus HCV[/B][/URL] could be interesting for you. It is still just 3.75m but they have good IVA's and seat a lot of Kerbals.

Oh yeah, tweak scale isn't a bad idea, I could use it on the taurus module
Thanks, I didn't knew that mod (taurus)
Btw I thank you, Tex_NL for the support message you put in your signature. I'm speaking for all people in my country. :)
